sentence.Network_en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

sentence.Network_en: "One thing you can never insure against is corruption among your staff."—"Agreed."
sentence.Network_cn: “永远也防不胜防的就是员工内部的贪污腐败。”——“同意。”

sentence.Network_en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
sentence.Network_cn: 房间很安静，无人主动提供更多的信息。

list.abs: he is the best hitter on the baseball team .他是棒球队的最佳打击手。

means.word_mean: 1. a game in which a pitcher allows the opposing team only one hit
